scripts.docs:api: PYTHONPATH=. uv run api2mdx --source-path . --package mirascope.experimental.v2.llm --output .docs-build/docs/api && mv .docs-build/docs/api/experimental/v2/llm/* .docs-build/docs/api/ && rm -rf .docs-build/docs/api/experimental
scripts.docs:preprocess: CONTENT_DIR=$(pwd)/.docs-build && cd node_modules/@mirascope/docs-viewer && DOCS_VIEWER_DIR=. bun scripts/preprocess-content.ts --content-dir $CONTENT_DIR
scripts.docs:serve: CONTENT_DIR=$(pwd)/.docs-build && cd node_modules/@mirascope/docs-viewer && DOCS_VIEWER_DIR=. bun scripts/start.ts --content-dir $CONTENT_DIR
scripts.docs:build: bun docs:clean && bun docs:copy && bun docs:api && bun docs:merge-api && bun docs:preprocess
